prompt: Summarize how agents plan tasks and execute tool calls.
bullets: Agents coordinate planning+execution with tool calls to achieve goals.

prompt: Explain context engineering in RAG pipelines.
bullets: Context engineering includes retrieval and grounding of relevant context.

This mini suite scores predicted tags vs ground truth.
Past deliverables include case studies and significant builds.

prompt: Combine the above in a single storyline.
bullets: An agentic approach with planning and tool-calls feeds a demo walkthrough.
